search.query: | rest splunk_server_group=flashlight_search_head /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | where title="$select_title$" | fields title author description dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time eai:acl* id is_scheduled is_visible next_scheduled_time search splunk_server updated action*
| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | stats count by title | table title | sort title

| eval is_visible=if(is_visible=="0","False","True") | eval is_scheduled=if(is_scheduled=="0","False","True") | rex field=id "servicesNS\/(?<location>.*)" | stats values(title) AS "Title" values(author) AS Author values(description) AS Description values(is_visible) AS "Visible" values(location) AS Location values(dispatch.earliest_time) AS "Earliest Time" values(dispatch.latest_time) AS "Latest Time" values(is_scheduled) AS "Scheduled" values(next_scheduled_time) AS "Next Run Time" values(updated) AS "Last Updated" | transpose include_empty=false | rename column AS "Title" "row 1" AS Description
| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | where title="$select_title$" | fields actions | stats count by actions | table actions | sort actions
| search actions=$select_action$ | head 1 | table action.$select_action$* | streamstats count as temp_id | stats values(*) AS * by temp_id | fields - temp_id
| table search | dedup search | rename search AS Search
